name: ap2-payment-gateway
description: AP2-Native Agent Payment Gateway - Policy-driven payment routing system

scripts.dev:clean: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('lsof -ti :3001 | xargs kill -9', {stdio:'inherit'}); console.log('✅ Killed processes on port 3001'); } catch(e) { console.log('ℹ️  No processes found on port 3001'); }"
scripts.dev:clean:all: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('lsof -ti :3000,3001 | xargs kill -9', {stdio:'inherit'}); console.log('✅ Killed processes on ports 3000 and 3001'); } catch(e) { console.log('ℹ️  No processes found on ports 3000 or 3001'); }"
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:clean && npm run dev
scripts.dev:restart:all: npm run dev:clean:all && npm run dev:all
scripts.ps:
node -e "console.log('
🔍 Processes on port 3000:'); try { require('child_process').execSync('lsof -i :3000', {stdio:'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('  None'); } console.log('
🔍 Processes on port 3001:'); try { require('child_process').execSync('lsof -i :3001', {stdio:'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('  None
'); }"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/frontend
